name: Cubox
description:
Start your adventer with Cubox a 3d blocky game with
open-world that promotes creativity, collaboration and
problem-solving in an immersive environment where
the only limit is your imagination.
Our community discord server:
https://discord.gg/gQvwDtW






Use your creativity to build castles, houses, fortifications and
much much more and all of that in infinite world.
Build solo or take a team and get started build whatever you imagine!
Use one of dozens of blocks and build your base, defend
against monsters and rule the world.
Enjoy water physics(lava, fire comming soon)







Create Guilds and team up with your friends.
PvP: Fight on BattleRoyale arena against other players
Increase your level and discover new biomes and monsters.
Play with your friends and together reach the adventure of Cubox.
Fight against other players or monsters which will try to defeat you.






Collect all 1500 items and become invincible.
Create your hero: Customize your character appearance
Gain gear and choose your customization however you want.
Show others your style because this world belongs to you!
Craft and upgrade powerful swords, armors, shields.






Join to out community, together we are strong!
Our community discord server:
https://discord.gg/gQvwDtW
